content: I'd really like a planet where all kinds of crops could grow together. But when I was little, my Gran'mama used to say... not everyone can "nurture a whole planet."
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A期待}Do you get tired sometimes? If... if there's anything I can do to help, even just a lickle bit, I'd be real happy~!
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Turnin' what your heart wishes for into a real planet, a real life... it's not an easy thing to do.
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A笑眯眯}It's my first time seein' a Luca Arbor grow. It really looks just like a plant. Feels kinda magical. Yeee~? Do you think it'll bear fruit mah?
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Are you off to bed now? I ain't sleepy just yet. Gonna <style=Highlight>head home</style> a bit later. I wonder if I'll dream about the Luca Arbor tonight...
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I was already full, actually... {A害羞冒烟}B-But I think I could manage to eat a bit more of the leftovers.
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Let our harvest go to waste? No way! I wanna grow even more good stuff for y'all!
info: 躺下入梦-云果闲聊_主流程文本II
